page.title: 07The Village Hall
page.content: Our village hall celebrated its 50th birthday this summer. Officially known as the Mary Clowes Hall, after its donor,a member of a wellknown local family. To mark the jubilee various special events took place ending with a grand village fair. The weather proved unkind but despite this a great time was had by young and not so young. Fancy dress competitions, funny hockey game were just two of the events villagers took part in. The hall is used by many different groups throughout the year. A flourishing Playgroup, Yoyng Farmers, Women's Institute, A very popular Youth Club and various different adult education classes. The hall is also used for discos dances and private parties.
